text: Proton: ...
Proton: I think we're being followed.
Proton: Prepare for battle!
Proton: I think that's all of the Xuirists here.
???: Errr... I've had enough of 'em crazy Xuirists.
???: Ya can't pay me 'nough to do this stuff.
???: You 'ere!
Proton: Me?
???: The hell else would I be talkin' to?
???: Ya probably hate the Xuirists, don't 'ya?
???: 'ey sent me out here to kill ya', after all.
???: Anyway, I've had 'nough of 'em crazy Xuirists.
???: Ya can't pay me 'nough to do another of 'em XuirRituals.
???: Since 'yer look like ya gonna fight 'em anyways, whynot let us help ya?
[Recruit the Mercenaries?](Q) Recruit(W) Do not recruit
???: That's a shame, ain't it?
Proton: ...
???: It seems you may be struggling...
Proton: Who are you?
???: I am Geomer, a disciple in Geom theory.
Geomer: You see, those Xuirists that you were justfighting were using Geom Energy.
Geomer: Geom Energy is a very powerful force, and itseems you are unfamiliar to it.
Geomer: As one wishing to spread the knowledge of Geom,I offer to aid you in combat using my Geom powers.
[Recruit Geomer?](Q) Recruit(W) Do not recruit
Geomer: You fear knowledge, for you cannot comprehend it.
[Xuirist Cavern]
Omega: ...
Omega: ...they have failed again.
Break: ...
Break: Must I remind you of what will happen?
Break: If you are out of troops to send out, then you must fight theProto-Xuir to the death yourself.
Omega: He will be approaching our camp soon, I'll gather all of our troopshere and slay him in our final battle.
Omega: I will not fail.
Break: You better keep your word.
